game.name: Looking Up I See Only A Ceiling
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 스트레스로 고통받는 소녀가 다락방을 탐험하려는 이야기.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A short psychological adventure about a stressed girl who wants to explore her ceiling.

reviewHighlights.text: Given the game's price, I didn't expect much in terms of content or lore, but I was quickly proven wrong. Not only is there a story, but it's rich, de...
